options.name: Infiltrator
options.description: Gain +1 Stealth, +1 Coordination, and +1 Evade. You can hold your breath for twice as long as normal.

options.name: Stealthy Movement
options.description: Gain +1 Stealth. You don't trigger pressure plates or similar weight-based traps unless you choose to.

options.name: Acrobatic Infiltration
options.description: Gain +1 Coordination. You can squeeze through spaces as if you were one size smaller, and you can climb difficult surfaces without making an ability check.

options.name: Threat Detection
options.description: Gain +1 Evade and +1 Senses. You have advantage on checks to detect traps, ambushes, and hidden threats.

options.name: Action : Vanish
options.description: Make a Stealth check to hide even when directly observed, as long as you have some form of concealment, cover, or distraction.

options.name: Reaction : Slip Away
options.description: When targeted by an attack or detected while hidden, you can move up to half your movement speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

options.name: Advanced Infiltration
options.description: Gain +1 Stealth and +1 Technology. You can bypass electronic security systems and locks with advantage on your checks.

options.name: Action : Perfect Timing
options.description: Study a patrol pattern, security system, or similar cyclic obstacle. You can automatically determine the perfect moment to slip past it without being detected.

options.name: Shadow Blend
options.description: Gain +1 Stealth. While in dim light or darkness, you can use your action to become invisible until you move or take an action.

options.name: Master Infiltrator
options.description: Gain +1 Stealth, +1 Coordination, and +1 Evade. You can move silently without making Stealth checks, and you ignore difficult terrain when moving stealthily.
